posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff W.
Cards must be graded PSA 2-4 or SGC 30/2-50/4

Ames-Hands at chest
Ames-Portrait
Bridwell-Cap
Crandell-Cap
Devlin-Portrait
Devore-Batting
Donlin-Seated
Donlin-Batting
Doyle-Batting
Doyle-Throwing
Doyle-Portrait
Durham-Portrait
Fletcher-Batting
Herzog-Standing
Latham-Portrait
Marquard-Hands at thighs
Marquard-Follow through
McCormick-Fielding

Please email me at

jwilliams81@mac.com

Thanks
Jeff W.
